heading: rants & raves
subheading: date: sun, 24 oct 1999 09:19:46 -0400 from: clay (rcgwcwu@walrus.com) to: newsfeedback@wired.com subject: re: berners-lee in mp3; quicktime i really don’t know why you would chose to post this interview in only the two mentioned forms (“berners-lee in mp3; quicktime,” 23.oct.99). i would’ve love to hear this interview, but i’m not d/l’ing huge sound files. […]
author: wired blogs
text: date: sun, 24 oct 1999 09:19:46 -0400 from: clay (rcgwcwu@walrus.com)to: newsfeedback@wired.comsubject: re: berners-lee in mp3; quicktimei really don't know why you would chose to post this interview in only the two mentioned forms ("berners-lee in mp3; quicktime," 23.oct.99). i would've love to hear this interview, but i'm not d/l'ing huge sound files. it would've been better to have posted this as a realaudio file so i could've heard it via streaming. as computer news web sites go, you guys always miss the mark. what a shame.
